ygData.subject: New goodies from Kedge Keep and other places ****SPOILER****
ygData.msgSnippet: Got this of Allakazam, lots of fun new toys :) . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . . . . . . Sharkbone Warhammer:  Damage 8, Delay 26. 1hblunt, +5 wis.  Wt.

Sharkbone Warhammer: Damage 8, Delay 26. 1hblunt, +5 wis. Wt. 3. magic
item. Classes: B, C, D, Mk, P, Ra, Ro, SK, Sm, Wr. Dropped by
Cauldronboil, a named shark in Kedge Keep.

Sharkjaw Cutlass: Damage 10, Delay 32. 1hslash, magic item. Classes: B,
M, P, Ra, Ro, Sk, Wr. Dropped by Cauldronboil, a named shark in Kedge Keep.

Red Dragonscale Armor: AC 21. chest, +20 str, +10 fire prot, +10 magic
prot. Wt. 2.1. magic item. Classes: B, P, Ra, Ro, SK, Wr. Obtained
through Rathe Mountains Quest.
I wonder if it shows as red when worn?


Not a Bard Item, but made me drool:
Trident of the Seven Seas: Damage 10, Delay 30. Piercing, Wt. 2. Effect of
Frost Strike. magic lore no drop. Rogue only. Dropped by Phinigel
Autropos in Kedge Keep.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
